data.pricing_trends: Pricing for accommodations and tours generally remains stable during autumn, with some discounts available as it is shoulder season.
data.booking_windows: Travelers can typically find competitive rates when booking 1-2 months in advance, particularly for flights and hotels in Antigua.
data.demand: Demand typically drops in late fall as families prepare for holidays, making it a good time for budget-conscious travelers.
data.competition: Alternative destinations boasting similar cultural and natural experiences include Costa Rica and Mexico's Yucatan Peninsula but Guatemala offers a unique blend of history and scenery.
